choices: Liam, the hot 25yr old neighbour
Will, the hot geek (aged 19) who lives a few doors down
Tom, a 15 year old who lives across the road
Danny, the super cute blond (aged 22) who lives next door (the other side)
Matt, a busy 33 year old single dad who lives next door to Tom
1.content:
Josh crept into the attic. His dad had just gone out, leaving him alone. The reason why he went straight to the attic? Well, his dad had just finished a new invention, but Josh didn't know what it was. He was interested in Science, unlike most boys his age. Other 17 year olds were out chasing girls or playing sports, but Josh was content with studying, or researching scientific things. Said invention (a machine) was sitting on a table, out in the open for all to see. It was so inviting... The big red button was attracting Josh like a bee to honey. Tentatively reaching out a finger, Josh hesitated. "What if it kills me or something? Or it breaks? Dad'll be furious if I break it..." he muttered. In the end, curiousty got the better of him and he pushed the button. The machine began to whirr, and Josh winced, thinking it would explode or something. But all that happened was a sudden flash of blue, and Josh blacked out...


"Huh... What?" Josh mumbled. He came to and felt like something was very different. First of all, he realised he was in someone else's house. Then, looking next to him, he saw a giant shoe. "What? How the hell..." he gasped, "Compared to that shoe, I must be smaller than an ant!" It seemed he had shrunk - his dad's invention was obviously a shrinking machine! Suddenly, two huge feet pounded the floor, causing an earthquake that sent Josh flying up each step. It was...
1.title: Teeny Tiny Teen

choices: Lifted his foot in disgust, he mistook Josh for a bug!
Bent down for a closer look - that's one funny looking bug...
Grabbed Josh up, straight from the floor
Didn't see Josh at all, he just bent down to pick something up
Nothing, just stomped straight past
11.content: Two absolutely colossal bare feet stomped into view. Looking up, Josh could see they belonged to a strapping young man wearing nothing but extremely tight white boxers. Obviously, at such a tiny size he couldn't really judge the man's true height, but right now he was a true monolith. He was a very handsome guy, with short brown hair, sizeable pecs, a toned stomach, a big bulge, a tight muscular butt and big tree trunk legs, finished off by two size 13 feet. When Josh caught the giant's face, he saw it was Liam, who lived a few doors down from him. ''Liam! Down here! Help, I shrunk and need some help!'' Josh screamed desperately. The god did look down and...
11.title: Liam, the hot 25yr old neighbour

choices: Liam slammed his foot down, crushing Jack
Liam slammed his foot down and missed, but left Josh in between his toes
Liam gave up and left the 'bug' alone
111.content: Suddenly, Liam boomed: ''DAMN BUGS!" and lifted one of his feet up high. The sole was slightly dirty - Liam walked around barefoot a lot. ''Shit, he's gonna squash me! I gotta get out of here, fast!'' Josh panicked. He ran as fast as his miniscule body would carry him, but it was nowhere near fast enough. Liam's foot slammed down into front of him, blocking his way entirely. ''DON'T WORRY LITTLE GUY, MY FEET DON'T SMELL THAT BAD!'' he laughed, lifting it again, ready to crush. This time...
111.title: Lifted his foot in disgust, he mistook Josh for...

1111.content:
Liam's foot hung over poor, frightened Josh, ready to drop into the little bug to crush it. Josh looked up at Liam, his foot blocking his view of Liam's body, he only saw his face and the devilish grin on his lips.

"Please don't Liam! It's me Josh! Please don't kill me!" Josh screams, but Liam didn't hear anything about it.

"Time to die, insect!" says Liam and Josh can only see Liam's dirty sole sunk down on him. In an instant Josh's life ended under Liam's foot.
Liam loved how it felt when the little beetle exploded under his foot. He turns his foot back and forth until there is only a dirty, bloody mass left from Josh's body, which hardly differs from the remaining dirt on Liam's sole.
1111.title: Liam slammed his foot down, crushing Jack

choices: Jump off and find help elsewhere
Climb Liam to get help
Stay down on his flip flop for now
1112.content:
Josh screamed as the foot came flying down again. It all was so terrifying, it seemed to take minutes to fall. Josh screwed up his eyes, terrified of the oncoming death. In an instant, Liam slammed his big foot down, and laughed racously. ''GOT THE LITTLE FUCKER!'' he laughed. Josh blacked out...

Suddenly, Josh came to and found himself on a foamy surface. Two hot and slightly wet walls were either side of him and there was a horrible smell. Had he died? No, he realised he was still alive. Looking round, he found he was wedged in between giant Liam's huge smelly toes, though it wasn't as bad as it could be as Liam had flip flops on. There was little space and he could barely breathe with the smell, so he made his way out from between the toes. It was quite hard but eventually he stood in front of the giant's big toe, which was of astonishing size. That alone was several times bigger than Josh. What to do next?
1112.title: Between the toes...

choices: Liam
Sean, Liam's friend
11122.content:
There was nothing for it. Josh would simply have to climb Liam, there'd be no point in getting off now as at his tiny size he'd surely be squashed in minutes if he ran round all tiny on the floor.So, taking a deep breath and preparing for a very long climb, Jack hoisted himself up onto Liam's toenail...

It was easy enough to climb Liam's leg - he had shorts on so half of the way was easy to climb. Ropy hairs made it a doddle to get up to his thighs. Josh looked up to see what formed the rest of his climb. Liam had on a tight vest, showing off his biceps and pecs. Running across Liam's thigh, Josh took a deep breath as prepared for the next stage of the climb...

It was relatively easy to grab folds of fabric and make his way up, but halfway up, Josh was getting really tired. Eventually, he had to give in, and blacked out (yet again)...

When he woke, he was in a sticky substance of medium thickness. Suddenly from up above came a massive potato chip - he had fallen into a bowl of dip on the table in front of Liam! Josh tried to get away from the incoming chariot of death but it scooped him up...

The chip rose up, and Josh found himself staring into the huge, wet mouth of...
11122.title: Climb Liam to get help

choices: ... is eaten
... falls off the potato chip
111221.content:
When Josh got closer to the hungry mouth, he realized that he had to do something, otherwise he would be devoured by Liam.
Josh used all his strength to free himself from the dip, but it was harder than expected. He came closer to Liam's mouth. His field of vision was almost completely occupied by it.
He saw Liam's teeth, the threads of saliva that hung there, and Liam's throat, in which he will soon disappear if he cannot free himself.
He was running out of time, if he doesn't get free now, Liam will eat and digest him, all that would be left of him would be a piece of fat on Liam's ass. Josh gathered all his strength again and ...
111221.title: Liam

1112211.content:
When Josh was just putting the potato chip in Liam's mouth, Liam stopped when his buddy Sean said, "Liam, look there. There's something in the dip on your chip."
Liam stops and pulls the chip out of his mouth and takes a closer look at the dip.
"Oh, there really is something." Liam said, "It looks like the beetle I crushed under my foot earlier, but maybe I missed it after all."
Josh actually wanted to call for Liam and his buddy, but the dip that was everywhere stuck his mouth.
"If this is really the same bug, then you should probably correct your failure." said Sean.
"You are right, Sean." Liam said. "You could avoid my foot, little bug, but you won't escape my mouth. I always wanted to know what it feels like to have a small, living being in my stomach, with the knowledge that it digests there alive Thank you for volunteering. "
Then Liam opens his mouth and pushes the potato chip in half. Then he closes his lips around it and licks the dip and Josh and swallows it. Josh falls down Liam's esophagus until he lands in the stomach. After Josh wakes up, it rains chewed potato chips on him. He runs to the nearest stomach wall, hits it and shouts "LIAM! PLEASE, LET ME OUT! I AM IT, JOSH! PLEASE, I DON'T WANT TO BE DIGESTED BY YOU!" but his screams were interrupted by the voices of Sean and Liam.
"I can't believe you really did it. How does it fill up with a live beetle in your stomach?" Sean asked.
"Well, knowing about it makes me feel really powerful, but otherwise it doesn't really feel any different." says Liam.
"What do you think? How does the little thing feel in there?" Sean asks.
"I don't know, I don't really care either. But tomorrow morning he'll feel like a piece of shit." says Liam and they both start laughing.
"Crap, crap, crap! You're right! If I don't get out of here, I'll soon be nothing more than a piece of shit and tomorrow morning I'll be squeezed out of Liam's asshole as part of a shit." Josh realized.
But no matter what Josh tried, he couldn't find a way out of that stomach. He soon passed out and drifted around in Liam's stomach until it passed into the small intestine. There Liam's digestive body took everything from Josh's body that he could use and stored it as fat on Liam's ass. The rest of Josh's body, which is no more than a few bones and scraps of clothing, moved on through Liam's intestine until it was combined at the end of the colon with Liam's other meals into a solid, brown mass.
The next morning Josh's remains are squeezed out of Liam's asshole and flushed into the sewers.
1112211.title: Eat the little bug

choices: Josh's clothes,he went for a look
A bug (Josh)
Nothing and left
Something moving around Josh's clothes

Josh looked up and saw the huge body of Tom towering over him.
Tom had always hated him for the pranks and joke he made about him.
Tom looked around,Josh screamed at the top of his lungs,Tom looked around and saw...........
13.title: Tom, a 15 year old who lives across the road

choices: Step on it with his bare feet

132.content: Tom sees a bug running along the floor,he decides to kill it,but how?
132.title: A bug (Josh)

info.brief_description: Josh shrinks to a tiny size near an unaware giant...
info.description:
Josh Brown is a sexually confused teenager, and he is very interested in science. But one day his curiousity gets the best of him, when he fiddles with his dad's invention - a shrink ray. It doesn't affect him immediately, but ultimately it lands him in big trouble...

RULES:
1. Keep Josh under an inch tall.
2. Keep Josh unseen, if he is detected make the giant mistake him for a bug.
3. Josh cannot interact with ANY females, so male giants only.
4. Try to keep sex at a low, I don't mind you adding a bit though.
5. No one sentence chapters, sorry but I'd prefer a sizeable paragraph (ie a few lines) at least.
